other.name: Sargon Baryosef
other.Info: aka Solomon Baryosef, aka Kbal Tlalae. A officier in the Camel Spider Brotherhood. After one his clients was apprehended he was forced to relocate away from Topeous Town to Tombleton.

other.name: Hertanas ElmsWay
other.Info: He is baronet of Flag Row in Tombleton. He is a 165 year old wizard. He managed to get in trouble with the Grand Wizard Council for some questionable acts. He is not a traitor but his actions did end up helping one of his country's enemies.

other.name: Yerterata the Fearless
other.Info: A Fifty-foot-long Greater Red Lava Dragon with battle scars and a torn sail. She was held in the Prison Camp of Memtor for 2 years

other.name: Gal Garsan
other.Info: The Warden of the Prison Camp of Memtor. He prides himself on keeping his prison orderly. He doesn't really like the Demons.

other.name: King George the seventeenth
other.Info: The King of Tombe. He is part of the Gold Griffin Dynasty.

other.name: Derlold
other.Info: A 715 year old wizard or magus from Topleous Town. He is a member of the Grand Wizard's Council. He owns the museum in his home city.

other.name: Jacobus Septentrionalis Carpus
other.Info: aka General James. Edmond's father. He is a legatus. He is the ruler of Maiores Topleous.

other.name: Henry Redfish
other.Info: aka The Swordsman. The leader of the Trompoe Resistance. He is a Werewolf from birth. He lost his hands to a Demon and had them replaced with the help of a Dwarven Mage.

other.name: Kermersu Khan
other.Info: The Court Wizard and Grand Duke of SchweizerKhan within the Goblin Empire. He is the half-brother of the first Khan of the Goblin Empire. The Demon Ambassador's main rival. He is also the head of the Aravdugaar Saryn Zovoel and the Shidet gol
